diagnosis.final_diagnosis: s/p AVR/MVR/CABG post-op acute cholecystitis s/p percutaneous cholecystostomy tube
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient was hospitalized due to shortness of breath and fatigue, with severe coronary artery disease documented via cardiac catheterization. The need for surgical intervention (AVR, MVR, CABG) was indicated by echocardiogram findings of PFO, AI, and MR, leading to the final diagnosis of undergoing surgery and subsequent acute cholecystitis treated with a cholecystostomy tube.
